META.name: description
META.content: Harbor Freight buys their top quality tools from the same factories that supply our competitors. We cut out the middleman and pass the savings to you!

DIV.NOSCRIPT:
JavaScript seems to be disabled in your browser.
You must have JavaScript enabled in your browser to utilize the functionality of this website.

DIV.style: display: block; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-weight: bold; text-align: center; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(37, 37, 37); vertical-align: bottom; top: 0px; width: 100%; z-index: 99999; background-image: url(https://images.harborfreight.com/hftweb/holiday/images/countdown_header_snowflakes.png); height: 33px; overflow: hidden; background-position: center center; background-repeat: no-repeat no-repeat;
display: inline-block; position: relative; margin-top: -3px; font-size: 12pt; font-weight: normal; top: 0px;

SPAN.style: font-size: 18pt; display: inline; position: relative; top: 3px; font-weight: bold;

DIV.style: float: right; color: rgb(71, 71, 71); margin-right: 10px; margin-top: 10px; font-size: 10pt; font-weight: normal;

DIV.LABEL: Enter Your Street Address, City, State, OR Zip Code

INPUT.placeholder: Enter Your Street Address, City, State, OR Zip Code
INPUT.name: zipcode_input

IMG.alt: 20% off coupon 12 Tools of Christmas Sale
Harbor Freight wins in quality and price
Large Tilt Flat Panel TV Mount
IMG.title: coupon_promo_2

IMG.alt: 20 fl. oz. HVLP Gravity Feed Air Spray Gun
IMG.title: coupon_promo_8

IMG.alt: 50 In Clamp and Cut Edge Guide
IMG.title: coupon_promo_11

IMG.alt: Free 25 ft. x 1 in. QuikFind Tape Measure with ABS Casing
IMG.title: coupon_promo_14

IMG.alt: Free 40 in. x 50 in. Moving Blanket
IMG.title: coupon_promo_15

IMG.alt: 3 ton Low Profile Steel Heavy Duty Floor Jack with Rapid Pump®
IMG.title: coupon_promo_16

IMG.alt: 6 Amp Heavy Duty Variable Speed Rotating Handle Reciprocating Saw
IMG.title: coupon_promo_17

IMG.alt: 5 mil Nitrile Powder-Free Gloves 100 Pc Medium
IMG.title: coupon_promo_18

IMG.alt: 3 gal. 1/3 HP 100 PSI Oil-Free Hotdog Air Compressor
IMG.title: coupon_promo_20

IMG.alt: 1/2 in. Drive Click Type Torque Wrench
IMG.title: coupon_promo_21

IMG.alt: 20V Hypermax™ Lithium 1/2 in. Impact Wrench - Tool Only
IMG.title: coupon_promo_24

IMG.alt: OmniPro™ 220 Industrial Multiprocess Welder with 120/240 Volt Input
IMG.title: coupon_promo_29

IMG.alt: 4000 Max Starting/3200 Running Watts, 6.5 HP (212cc) Generator EPA III with GFCI Outlet Protection

LI.A: California Transparency in Supply Chain Act Disclosure

DIV.STRONG: For The Latest, Up To Minute News, Follow Us

DIV.H2: How does Harbor Freight sell GREAT QUALITY tools at the LOWEST prices?
DIV.P: We have invested millions of dollars in our own state-of-the-art quality test labs and millions more in our factories. So our tools will go toe-to-toe with the top professional brands. And we can sell them for a fraction of the price because we cut out the middleman and pass the savings on to you. It's just that simple! Come visit one of our 1000+ stores Nationwide and see why now more than ever...if you buy your tools anywhere else, you're throwing your money away!

UL.LI: We'll Beat Any Competitor's Price Within 1 Year of Purchase

IMG.alt: Build your career with Harbor Freight

DIV.P: © Copyright 2018 Harbor Freight Tools. All Rights Reserved. MATERIAL AND PHOTOS ON THIS SITE ARE THE COPYRIGHTED PROPERTY OF HARBOR FREIGHT TOOLS AND MAY NOT BE USED WITHOUT THE PRIOR WRITTEN PERMISSION OF HARBOR FREIGHT TOOLS.

Harbor Freight Tools does not endorse any other business or organization or any technique in any customer and/or fan video. Always follow all of the instructions and warnings included with our products. We make no representation or warranty of any kind by including any customer and/or fan video on our website.

LIFETIME WARRANTY
Lifetime Warranty on Hand Tools! We guarantee our Hand Tools to be free from defects in material and workmanship for the life of the product. Limitations apply.

ABOUT HARBOR FREIGHT TOOLS
Founded in 1977, Harbor Freight Tools is the leading discount tool retailer in the U.S. selling great quality tools at "ridiculously low prices" in our 1000+ stores nationwide and on its website www.harborfreight.com. Harbor Freight Tools stocks over 7,000 items in categories including automotive, air and power tools, shop equipment and hand tools. With a commitment to quality and a lifetime guarantee on all hand tools, Harbor Freight Tools is a favorite of automotive and truck repair shops, government agencies, schools, manufacturers, contractors and tool enthusiasts who want top-quality and great selection and value. The results speak for themselves - with over 40 million customers and thousands of people switching to Harbor Freight Tools every day.

DIV.STRONG: Receive Free Discount Coupons and Catalogs
